item.title: Bootcamp Day 1 Lesson Plan
item.description: Web Delivery Game Materials Colored tape or yarn: floor as the network paths between computers Yarn: connections between computers for each message Paper labels: for each computer address and the network path names Paper cards: for the action and address/message cards Roles Messenger: in charge of delivering messages from their “home” computer to others. They must take the message and string starting at their home and running it to the new computer Switcher: center of all the computers.
